rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment states detected the presence of the virus using neutral language.
No loaded rhetorical question is present in the text.
The segment reports detection location and type but contains no explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment describes detection location and number, not capabilities or preparedness.
The segment mentions detecting the virus in an undisclosed number of birds, not reporting a specific metric.
The segment reports detection details but does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
Attributed statement reports factual detection neutrally.
Factual report of detection location and flock type attributed to USDA, without explicit framing cues.
